text: ethakota mata 34.
mewa ussanne kuddo.
oya passata wewalen gasima sampurna nithi wirodhi wadak nithiye hatiyata nam.

podu rajya mandala krida sandaha kerena idikirimwaladi danata 43 k miyagihin nawadilliya ee. pi. 2010 okthobar masa 3-14 dakwa nawa dilliye pawathwimata niyamitha podu rajya mandala krida sandaha idikeremin pawathina godanangiliwala sewaye nirathawa siti kamkaruwan 43 ku miyagos atha.

ane da kiyanne !
“kopi kade” teli natya malawa aarambha karanna nalu niliyan thoraganime wadamuluwak pawathwuna.

samaharak diya waga sthapanaya kirim waladi, prathichakrikaranaya ha jala/hathpasa pathirunu ushnathwaya laba ganima sandaha minisa wisin nishpaditha shakthiya, thakshanika wisandum ha parisarika palaka matha athishayin randa pawathimata hethu we.

prajathanthrawadi deshapalana nayakayaku wu alfrad dureyiappata eda thabu wedi pahara sankethawath kale, prajathanthrawadaya wedi thaba ghathanaya kirimak bawath, ada indiyanu rajaye anugrahayen dureyiappa kridanganaya nawatha sanwardhanaya kota wiwrutha kirima magin ee athitha mathaka maka dama, sanhindiyawa pilibanda nawa gamanaka balaporoththuwak athi karawana bawath janadhipathithuma mehidi wadiduratath prakasha kaleya.
una hethuwen sathi 2k pamana sitimen sayit eke basunnahalata mawa amathaka wela athi yayi sitha sathutu wemin gettuwen athulata adiya thibbemi.
ee mokak wunath apa me batahira kristhiyani aadhipathyayen midenna oona.

shri lanka podujana peramune nayaka mahacharya ji.el. piris, mahajana eksath peramune nayaka dinesh gunawardhana, mahacharya janitha abewikrama liyanage, shri lanka nithignya sangamaye sabhapathi yu.aar. da silwa, waidya channa sudath jayasumana, nithignya kalyananda thiranagama, dabliw.di.aar.dharmasiri gunarathna yana pirisa mema panath ketumpatha abhiyogayata lak karamin pethsam gonukara thibe.me siyalu dena rajapakshage asuchi rasa wanuwa pirisa we.
yako mewwa kiyawala thaniyen hinawenakota gedara unda ahanawa pissuda kiyala.
wala me sambandhaka wayar deka eka eka widihata thiyenna puluwan.
api aniwaryayenma "dijital" kara ya yuthuyi.

rawi, sikuru, senasuru thundenama swakshethrayi.

nam sarwarayak rajaya magin aarambha karalayi thiyenne.

obe awanka adahas agaya nokaloth man thawath karumakkarayek wewi..
in palamu wanna apage aramuna saha ilakkaya wenuwenma eka hithin kapawimayi.

wathman yahapalana aanduwa bihiwanne 2015 agosthu 17wanada pawathi parlimenthu mathiwaranayen pasuwa wana athara dayasiri jayasekarata adala miliyanaya labena dinaya wana witath parlimenthu mathiwaranaye pracharaka katayuthu aarambha wi thibena athara dayasiri jayasekara da ema mathiwaranayedi ekjasath janatha nidahas sandhanaye apekshakayeki.
ema kumaruwan sahodarayin hathara deneku saha sahodarayan dedenaku sahitha pawule suwisheshi wa babalenna bawata pathwiya.
mita awurudu 11ta kalin ambalangoda patabandimulle rukada sandarshanayak thibba.
ee sanwadaya thulin aluth danuma godak mathu wenawa.
udaraye aabadha athiweyi.
kalakanni nositiya thanwalata giyama wenade...
siya pasal samaye mithuriyan hamuwe dukbara muhunak penwima owunada dukata path kirimata hethuwak se sithunu nisawen nadi sinawakin muwa sarasa gaththaya.

ee hinda wenasakatath ekka jeppontath rata baradila balanna api hitha hada gatha yuthuya.
wiwidha kalawala wiwidha wes ganimi...
lamayi bahira sellam karanne na.
palamu karthuwe aarthika wardhana wegaya sandaha ihala dayakathwayak sewa anshayen labi atha.
adu washayen hethu dekak nisa dewana prashnaya wada niwaradiya.
thawa kalayak ehema thiyeyi.
mama me pilibandawa tikak gambaurata antharjalayen soya baluwemi.

ese thibiyadi hasyata karuna nam leftinan karnal hewage 2017 nowambar 27 sita desambar 1 dakwa eksath jathin wisin pawathwana lada “siwil wasiyan aaraksha kirime” siyol hi pawathi dina 5 ka wadamuluwakata sahabhagi wi athi bawayi.

me jiwana wilasithawa thulin ki්radawatada
- shri lankikayan kiyanne harima lassana jathiyak.
me pirisa, thama mathaya ha ekanga nowana aya ‘rajakshalage wahalun’ kiya hanwadu gasuwath, nodanuwathwama kawuru kawuruth, kage ho wahalun bawata pathwa hamaraya.
eka eka kale eka eka widihe rali aawa.
me mathrukawa methanin nimawiya yuthuma yayi nisala sithuweya.
*** - hari.
“ohu mage wakugaduwa wikunuwe mage pawule ayata ohu illa siti dawadda labadimata nohaki wu nisa.”
awurudu kate pissu hadaganima
awasana maha tharageta therila kolambaa yanna innakota mage athe thibune ekama eka ru.1000yi.
ee wage ma thaththwa palaka niladharintath gathamanawak dila owun nihada karanawa’ kiyayi.
ma haki thath pin daham karami.
akkayi nangiyi denna hitiye kihili deke...
aanduwa wiwechanaya karamin janathawata nisi thorathuru laba dun 33000 nam web adawiyakda brahaspathinda sita thahanam kara thibena bawath manthriwaraya pawasayi.

ma, sewa awashyathawaya matha bawa pa්rakasha kara, sthana maru kota, nishchitha sewa kalayen pasuwa mata himi sthana maruwa illa siti wita, eya pa්rathikshepa kirima magin mage mulika ayithiwasikam kada wi athi bawa pa්rakasha karami.
ahh bas wala kochchi wala yana ganu...
ohu mese ambalangoda sita ekwarama polonnaruwata sanka්ramanaya wi aththe janadhipathi maitha්ripala sirisena mahathage malanuwan wana dangli sirisena mahathage arayuma paridiya.
mama lajjawen sinasunemi.
ape gedarin mata bonna thahanamak na...
obata owunge gataluwa pahasuwenma wisindimata hakiwenna puluwan, namuth daruwawa harigassana wita garuthwayen eya kala yuthuyi.
ikmanatama koteth adimu ayiye..

owun ge eeniya yudha wirodhaya yanu sinhalayan demala jathiwadaya idiriye dana gassima sandaha yodagath upaka්ramayak pamanaki.
shri lankawa lokaye wenath rajyayan samanga samipa sabandatha athikota ewaka pawathi loka samajaye diyunuwa shri lankawata labadimata katayuthu kaleya.
ehema aarakshawak nathnam aayojakayo enne naha.
thamange piyatath, eyage biridage ammatath pinpinisa thamayi me pinkama sidukale.
me dungada awilla thiyenne yureni langin kiyala hungak ayata danila.
ejapa manthri athadanguwata
issarinma eeka wataha ganna oone.
“roginta owungema bhashawen katha kirima wadagath” yayi ohu pawasayi.
ee tharam deyak wunata passeth apata asadharanayak wunada kiyala nikamatawath soyabalanne naththe ayi.

thaman mahansiyen godanagagath adhirajyaya wenakenekuta gila ganimata idadi aththe mandayi yanna matanam gataluwaki.behethaka gunathmaka bawaya ha mila athara oba dakina sabandathawaya 100% niwaradiyayi mata nosithe..
owun kiwe ehi mila ma upayana mudalata wada wadi bawayi.

nathnam harakotiye rashmi nisada?

ehema wenne kohomada...
api punchi kale thissa aa wada satahan meheyawana kota ahan inna harima aasayi.
puhunu kirime shailiya agayima puhunu puhunu kirima agayimata samana nowe.
ee widiyata wiwidha siduwimwala pasubim mata kiyanna puluwan.
the thahanamen loku awulak – janadhipathi maithrith, janadhipathi putinta lipiyak yawayi..!
ee anuwa nawa sanshodhanaya hamuwe ema nithi wenas kara atha.
ethakota aathar si klak ta shri lankika purawasi bhawaya dunne kohomada ?
eya matha yapena pirisa wadiyi.
mema pera nosithu baddha wima nisa apurwa wargaye gramschi chinthakayan ralak pasuwa bihi wiya. 2005 warshaye di ma wisin magenma asana lada prashnaya meseya.

emenma mema karthawyaya rajayakata pawara nihandawa bala sitima nowa mema kriyawaliya sandaha thamanta haki pamana dayaka wimata rate janathawata, pradhana washayen tharuna parapurata wagakimak atha. wisheshayen ma oba jiwath wana pradeshaya thula ewani sanwardhanaya wiya yuthu mattame pasal athnam ema pasal pilibandawa awadhanaya yomukara ema pasal sanwardhanaya sandaha obage shramaya, kalaya saha danuma yam pramanayakata kapakirimata obata hakinam eya anagatha parapura wenuwen kerena mahangu aayojanayak wanne ya.
mathakada oya dawasak kiwwa mata wahina welawata eliyata gihin balan inna aasayi kiyala.
malak wennam ithin nelannata siyumali athin
thama chanda thiyanna aawe na.
ee wunata pita kotuwe rawumak giyoth apata penenne pitaratin genwapu palathuru kantenar gananak bakkiwala lassanata ahurala thiyenawa.

rate wenadewal paththaren dakina sirisena pasugiyada “pibidena purawara pulathisi asiriya” namin polonnaruwe janathawa gonata andawana wadapiliwela kriyathmaka karamin anthawadinta ha thrasthawadinta udagedi dena thaman janadhipathi kirimata mahansi wi wada kala amarikanu wathman janapathi obamage hitha sanasime aramunanin anawakiyak pawasa thibe.
pad eka pawa nomile illanne ewan amanayini..
ee siyalla paudgalikawa ek ek guru mahathmin wisin pawathwagena yanu labana eewaya.
machalawaggo, chathukkanipathapali, angguththaranikaya
hodanam komenat ekak kotannath amathaka karanna epa oon.
ee para, mehema ane…..
muhunu potha sambandakam wadi diyunu kala.

eheth kisiwakuth dora wiwruththa kara nomathi thaththwaya hamuwe siya iwasime simawa ikmawa gos athi lakshaman wijemanna mahatha kara aththe siya dakunu kakulen pradhana doratuwata waren pahara di dora kada gena amathiwarayage karyalayata kada wadimaya.

me thaththwaya yatathe balahathkarayen athurudan kirimwalin siyaluu thanaththan aaraksha kirima sandaha wu jathyanthara sammuthiya pilibanda panath ketumpathata sahaya dakwima sandaha saha parlimenthuwe sammatha wu athurudan thanaththan pilibanda karyala panatha kadinamin kriyathmaka kirima padanam kara ganimin nidahase wedikawa athurudanwuwange pawul ekathuwa ha ekwa pasugiya 05 wanada madhya sakachchawak kandawa thibuni.

oonama hadisi praharayak sandaha mema yana siruwen thaba athi bawa eksath janapada marin hamudawa pawasanawa.
ese sidu kalahoth eyin siduwana winashaya obatayi.

pasale siduwu kisiyam adupaduwak pilibandawa janamadhya hamuwedi heli kirima sambandhayen chodana naga pethsamkariyata erehiwa katayuthu kirimata wagauththarakaruwan pelambai athi bawa idiripath wu wachika karunu ha likhitha karunu anuwa peni yanne yayida siya thindu prakashaya magin shreshtadhikaranaya penwa di thibuni.

maha wiharaya sthapanaya kirime di da, dutugamunu raju wisin aakramanikayagen rata muda ganimata kala satane di da, thripitakaya grantharuda kirime di da, atuwa liwime di da, polonnaruwe maha shasana shodhana karyaye di da, dambaadeniya yugaye di dharma grantha liwime di da, nawatha upasampadawa handunwa dime di da, brithanyaya kiritayata apa ratehi palanaya pawara dun giwisume di da, awasana washayen apa wisin sampadanaya karagath janaraja wyawastha dekehi ma da mema udara wu karyaya apa wisin awadharanaya karanu laba thibe.buddha shasanaya surakshitha wana thak kal apa jathiyak washayen aaraksha wanu nisaka ya.
shri lankawe the wathu paudgalikakaranaya thulin athi wu samaja aarthika balapama pilibanda adhyayanayak
bangali witharak nemeyi lankawe minissuth ochchara thamayi.
me sathwaya thula dewaduthayaku thula thibiya yuthu gambhirathwaya ha udarathwaya penwana kisima sadhakayak nowiya.
ee thana padurak netha gatuna.

ee nisa manthriwaru athare athi wu dushitha thaththwayath kathanayakawarayage kriya kalapayath gatum sahagatha thaththwayan nirmanaya wimath me siyalla salakillata ganimin athi wu deshapalana arbudaya wisanda ganima sandaha sudusuma prajathanthrawadi yukthisahagatha wuth sadharana wuth thinduwa wiya yuththe eya podu janathawata bharadima yana ee uthum prajathanthrawadi paramarthaya itu karamin thamayi mama parlimenthuwa wisuruwa hara maha mathiwaranayak pawathwimata thiranaya kale.

eda sita ada dakwa boho gayaka gayikawan,wadath sundara andamakin kiyanawa nam kowulan kewiliyan anantha apramana sankhyawak bihi wi thiye.mama owunge githada asami.kapugege katahadata wada athishaya romanthika wuda,jawayen piruna wuda katahadawal boho ee athara thibe.eeth ee kisima hadakata mage manase kapuge nam kesaga minisata himi wa athi aasthanaya sorakam karannata hakiyawa labi natha.ee mandayi aluthin atuwa tika tippani sapayanne kima..?
ee langa piyawara wuye danata bhawitha karana krama ha sansandanaya kalawita mema sanyoga deka ketharam paladayida bawa pariksha kirimayi.
dharma margaye aarambhaya wana samma dittiya poshanayakota ganimata nam pinwath oba buddhanussathiya, dhammanussathiya, sanghanussathiya bhawanawak hatiyata puhunu wima athyawashya karanayak wenawa.

sisilana kulunu rahithawa muhudu jalaya bhawithayen kriyathmaka wana sisilana paddhathiyak wyapruthiya sandaha yodawa, nishpadana kriyawaliye unusum wana jalaya shel bokka aashritha werale sita mitar 480 k durin ha mitara 07 k gambaurin wu sthanayakata mudaharimata niyamithawa thibunada ema yojanawa sambandhayen madhyama parisara adhikariye ekangathawak labi nomatha.

samange kamare hitapu anith eka kiwwe, saman thunata withara ganu lamaya hambawela awilla mahansiyi kiyala nida gaththa witharayi kiyala.onna ookayi warthamana thaththwe.mata mathakayi meka ee kellath ekka yalu une thunweni wasare innaddi.
thawa ithin nawa gilena mohotheth sewaya sapayapu wadana kandayamath ee wagemayi.
jiwan kumarathunga, dilhani ashokamala
paniya jalaya namathi podu awashyathawa itu kara dima pradeshiya sabhawe wagakimaki.
